action_nameString representing the name of the action topic to communicate on
ctrl_velocity_topicString representing the intra-processes topic name to communicate velocity-arc with the controller

Member Function Documentation

void VelocityControlServer::executeCB ( const oryx_drive_controller::VelocityCommandGoalConstPtr &  goal) [private]

Callback for executing a new velocity command

Parameters:
goalthe goal message to process

Currently, all this does is pipe the received goal directly to the ArcDriveController. At some point it should do some more advanced processing and feedback development
